rules.description: Change caps_lock to control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone.
Change right_shift to fn if pressed alone.
A one-handed layout keyboard layout. Hold spacebar to mirror the keyboard layout so that both sides of the keyboard can be intuitively typed by either hand on its own.
Change caps_lock to control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone.
Change left_control + middle click to mission control
Maps right side Cmd+Home to Cmd+`
Maps right side Cmd+End to Cmd+Tab
Maps right side Ctrl+End to Ctrl+Tab
